subject: Re: [junit] testCreate, testUpdate, testDelete: make one single test out of it?
msgSnippet: ... I might start with three tests, finally removing those which are redundant. However, unlike in application code, documentation purposes sometimes make me
messageBody:
> Would you write 3 or just 1 test method for that example?

I might start with three tests, finally removing those which are redundant.
However, unlike in application code, documentation purposes sometimes make
me keep all three tests. But I'd certainly extract the common code into
shared private methods.

Johannes
